verbose_text: In some tumors, including C6 gliomas, expression of the lactate transporter MCT1 is upregulated near the tumor rim [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] an arrangement which has led to the hypothesis that some of the lactate produced deeper in a tumor diffuses towards the rim where it is taken up and oxidized [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression of the lactate transporter MCT1
